name: FLIGHTLESS (itch)
description:
Play as a time traveller from the distant future, gone back to try and prevent the exctinction of the dodo bird. With the help of your pet dinosaur you might just thwart those reckless, hungry conquesting fannies!

Lure the dodo's back to your time machine with fruit and scare off the humans with your dinosaur. You cannot drop fruit when on your dinosaur. When all the dodos are saved, return to the time machine! 

Arrow keys to move, space bar to drop fruit, shift to mount/dismount your dinosaur, or shake trees.

Good luck!

Made by Sam Greer & Ross Binden in GameMaker
